resources.string: Last name : OUAMAR\nFirst name : Yahya\nRegistration number : 54915
Are you sure you want to logout ?

Knowledge Quiz: Know It All is a quiz app designed to test and expand your general knowledge. You will receive a new trivia question or factoid to answer.

Answering Questions: Read the question carefully and select the correct answer from the multiple-choice options provided. Choose wisely, as you will earn points for each correct answer. 

XP Points: For each correct answer, you will earn XP (Experience Points). The more correct answers you accumulate, the higher you will climb on the global leaderboard. 

Leaderboard: Compete with other users from around the world to see who can earn the highest score. Keep an eye on the leaderboard to track your progress and strive to reach the top. 

Learning Experience: Know It All aims to make learning fun and addictive. You will be amazed at how much you can learn while having an enjoyable time and competing with others. 

Remember, the more you play and engage with the app, the more knowledge you will acquire. Good luck and have fun exploring the world of trivia and facts with Know It All!
NOTE : YOU CAN CHECK YOUR SCORE IN THE LEADERBOARD
In a galaxy far, far away, a disturbance in the Force has disrupted the flow of events!
